title: Melancholy Melancholic Melancholinist
original_name: メランコリメランコリックメランコリニスト
sinopse:
Although extremely reluctant, Ogata decides to go to the dentist after getting a tooth ache. The problem only seems to get bigger when he meets his dentist Dr. Kitagawa. Ogata's obvious reactions seems to have awoken the sadist in Dr. Kitagawa.

(Source: MU)
